Object Parameters: Length of chain in game units

Let (X,Y) be the center of the area where the Chain Chomp snaps to (neither X nor Y are height coordinates). If X is positive, X/10 is the X-Value for the setting; if X is negative, 65536 + X/10 is the X-Value for the setting (make sure to include the negative sign when adding!).

Let (X,Y) be the center of the area where the Chain Chomp snaps to (neither X nor Y are height coordinates). If Y is positive, Y/10 is the Y-Value for the setting; if Y is negative, 65536 + Y/10 is the Y-Value for the setting (make sure to include the negative sign when adding!).
Time to wander around (in 1/60 seconds); if 0, about 5 seconds is used. Add 3.5 seconds for full cycle time
Description:
Chain Chomp. Snaps in a wedge shape that is directed to a given point.
Hwanwan and wanwan only work together if the effect files are absent.
